features: POWER: This speaker has 150 watts of power with a built-in sound port for excellent bass. An option is to get the AP525 with a 70V switch transformer with 8 ohms for commercial installations.
DESIGN: The OSD Audio 70V commercial pair patio speaker can be daisy-chained for long distance runs. Or switch to 8 Ohm and place anywhere in your backyard or home.
MOUNT: The included, flexible mounting brackets allow for 180-degree rotation and 60-degree tilt, enabling you to mount either vertically or horizontally, giving flexibility for the best coverage.
MODERN: A sleek modern fancy look comes from the powder-coated rust-resistant grille for the speaker to last whether it is used indoors or outdoors. This quality accessory blends into the decor.
DURABLE: In order for the speaker to last outside, there is stainless steel hardware for long-lasting durability and great sound in unknown temperatures, inclement weather, and changing seasons.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: OSD AP640 6.5" Outdoor Patio Speaker Upgrade your outdoor audio with the AP640 6.5-inch Outdoor Patio Speaker Pair. Available in black or white, these speakers are designed to withstand the elements while delivering powerful and clear sound. The AP640 speakers are perfect for patios, decks, and pool areas or large outdoor spaces. Easy to install and built to last, these speakers will take your outdoor entertainment to the next level!

OSD Audio AP Series Patio Speakers Upgrade your outdoor area with our OSD Audio AP Series Patio Speakers. With weather-resistant construction and a range of sizes and colors, these surface mount speakers offer a seamless blend of style and performance. Plus, with easy installation and user-friendly connectivity, you'll be enjoying your favorite tunes in no time.

Weather The AP640 Outdoor Patio Speakers are built to withstand the elements with a weather-resistant ABS polymer enclosure and rust-resistant aluminum grille Bracket Movement The AP640 Outdoor Patio Speakers come with a ‘U’ bracket included for easy installation. The bracket is designed to mount vertically or horizontally! Speaker Wire When setting up an outdoor speaker system, it is important to use speaker wire that is rated for outdoor use. Check out OSD Audio Outdoor Speaker Wire New Zone Adding outdoor speakers to a new zone in your backyard can enhance your audio experience. The AP640 Outdoor Patio Speakers are an excellent upgrade

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars They Sound Great!!!!!!
reviews.reviewText: For the price and value, you cannot go wrong with these speakers. They were easy to install and sound great. These replaced some 15 year old speakers. I have used other OSD products, and they all have been well built and offer a great value for performance. The family was very surprised how good it sounded for the price we paid for. Time will tell if it will last in the Miami weather. Now my family wants to add more outdoor speakers. We use them with a Sony Two channel receiver.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 4, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars They are rated at 88db but there easy to push, don't over power them though you may damage them.
reviews.reviewText: What o like about them is the mids and highs I'm pushing them on the Yamaha Rx-v638 and boy do they sing. Now granted the Yamaha is overpowering them but I limit the volume to -10db on master volume. If you looking for bass up top these ain't for you I bought them for surround sound fronts and let my 250w rms subwoofer handle the bass. They sound good paired with a good sub they are temporary but I can understand why someone would be content with going to order 2 more pair if the price is the same but I got my eyes on klipsh for more depth in two channel mode when listening to music they make great surround sound speakers though just no bass to judge by so keep that in mind. Update anyone?? Ok so when they say 10 to 80 watts it's more like 10 to 40 unless you play them above 100- 120hz they don't like low frequency so that 90hz will pass if your playing on a source that does not exceed 40 watts rms. That said they sound great on hometheater system I'm relying on my sub for low frequencies which will change when I find a better center channel you don't need much to push them but if your into rnb/hiphop get a sub, they are crisp I highs and midslows are lack luster unless for movies and TV series. For context, I'm using the Yamaha rx-v638 which I know is to strong for these but music is not the purpose of purchase. I limit my receiver to -15db, and it tops out at +15db I'm about clarity over loudness and I'm more than satisfied with the results. Besides I like having the more power in the reserves let's my know I'm not pushing my receiver to hard. I don't plan on buying a power amp with this receiver cause it only has 2 channel pre-outs. But for a 5.2.2 these speakers are great. The grills are not mentioned to be taken off so don't, my guess is people like to see the woofer move. But let me tell you if it's moving to your liking then they won't last long and again bass and longevity don't walk hand in hand with these guys. So take it easy, huh. Oh and people buy these for outside fun please don't I live in New England and they wouldn't last a year out here in my humble opinion. We get all four seasons to the definition out here, lol. We'll that's my review if they die on me will let you know now that your reading this you have an idea on how they were used and treated with care of course like I treat my dog. Good luck!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 10, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars very good for the price
reviews.reviewText: I needed switchable speakers. there are certain zones in my outside area of 15 speakers that need a little less power than others. These work perfectly for this! I have one auxiliary volume knob, and didnt want to buy and install many more. This is way easier and does the trick.many of my speakers are the rock shaped ones on the ground, but for the ones that arent I am now planning to upgrade to these.I am using them with a 1500 watt amplifier, and some of them are wired over 100ft away from the amp. I am not sure how much power I am giving to each speaker, but they can be cranked up pretty loud and dont distort like my previous speakers did.I dont have a lot of bass going to my speakers, because I have separate sub woofers, but they do have more bass than any of my other speakers without changing any settings. These are much bigger than I expected. They do match the measurements, but they are over double the size of the speakers they replaced.If I didnt need the individual speakers to be switchable, and didnt need so many speakers, I would probably go for something a bit more high end.. but these are the perfect speakers for me.These speakers are mounted outside on a wooden beam. They do not have a wall behind them, which would make them sound better. I would tell anyone interested in outdoor sound to try these!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good Value, Pretty Good Sound, Decent Bass
reviews.reviewText: I'm pleasantly surprised with the sound. I'm using these speakers with a class-D amp, Fosi Audio TB10D 600W TPA3255. The sound is important, but equally important is having the amp run cool since it will be inside a weather-proof box. I honestly surprised at how good the sound quality is for the price and 8" woofer size. If this holds up over time, it's a deal. I wanted to get the quasi-legendary Dayton IO8XTB but those are out of stock for several months and I need them for a project. For my needs, I don't need great deep base (though that'd be a plus). But can say these 8" woofers do a decent job with it. I read a review of OSD's other 8" oudoor speakers, the AP840. That reviewer opened them up and found poor-quaity crossover conenctions. I'm hoping that this set is upgraded, and was willing to pay a little more for it. Time will tell. So far I'm happy with the purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sound very good and was exactly what need for pool/ patio area.
reviews.reviewText: These speakers are very good. I read a lot of reviews on the AP650 (which were rated very well), but decided to go with larger woofer for more base. The 8" woofers provide the sound I was looking for outside. You won't be disapppointed. Couple other small things to note. They're fairly large (you can't get 8" woofer in anything smaller) and supposed built to withstand weather, but suggest the manufacturer sell some type of small covers to protect from sun/rain. They're last longer, since I only use mine on weekends. Crystal clear sound and provide enjoyable listening.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. A little big for an 8 inch, but sounds really great. I have them connected to the Fosi Audio BT30D Pro with Bluetooth. Easy setup.

reviews.reviewTitle: Great sound and really intuitive install
reviews.reviewText: I really like the sound from these speakers! Clean and clear and enough bass for a little shake when you want it. Other than the sound, I really like how the install hardware works it was really easy to mount and adjust the direction. I'm very glad I bought them! Great value for the money!

J'ai décidé d'acheter ces hauts parleurs suite aux bonnes critiques.Je ne suis pas déçu.Les haut-parleurs ont été installés dans une pergola et chaque soir j'ai le bonheur d'écouter de la musique à l'extérieur.Les aigus et les fréquences moyennes sortent très bien.Les basses sont correctes.Je suis entièrement satisfait.Nous avons aussi une paire de haut-parleurs Definitive Technology à l'extérieur. Ils sont plus puissants et le son est meilleur mais ils sont deux fois plus dispendieux et plus lourds.Je recommanderais les hauts parleurs Definitive Technology pour une installation à la piscine et les AP650 dans une pergola.Étant habitué à écouter de la musique au sous-sol en surround 5.1 je redécouvre le plaisir d'une bonne écoute en stéréo à l'extérieur.

reviews.reviewTitle: Phenomenal sound and bass at a budget friendly price.
reviews.reviewText: To use an overused adjective, these speakers are truly awesome. Well made and feel durable. Seriously deep bass and accurate sound reproduction even at higher volumes. Minimal sound distortion and no need to have a high power amplifier because these speakers boast an excellent 96db/W efficiency rating. I have these and the smaller 640 series on my very large backyard patio and the sound is perfect whether rocking out party tunes or enjoying Sunday brunch classical. One caution is that these speakers are quite heavy so be sure to use strong anchors for the wall/eaves brackets. Recommend mounting vertically if possible because brackets seem to be stronger when used this way. ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐

These speakers not only met my expectations, they surpassed them. I use them on my large 2 acre rural backyard on the patio. The sound is rich and clear with surprisingly good bass response for small speakers in a large area. Will definitely order another 2 sets to compliment my backyard when I finish landscaping. Seem to be holding up well under covered eaves even after the wettest summer in 50 years. As a diehard music and nature soundscape enthusiast, I recommend these speakers over higher priced competitors that sounded muddy with brassy, tinny high frequencies.
Good price fast shipping sound great not much else to say
